mng: to serve as an official, an official, the two chess pieces in Chinese chess guarding the "general" or "king" 將|将[jiang4]

exm.mng: to serve as an official, an official, the two chess pieces in Chinese chess guarding the "general" or "king" 將|将[jiang4]
to take up an official post
to retire from a government post (old)
one who is successful in one's studies, can become an official (idiom)
court lady, palace maid, traditional painting of beautiful women
